text: Jodeci is an American R&B; quartet. The group formed in 1989 in Charlotte, North Carolina. The members of the group are DeVant√© Swing, Dalvin DeGrate (aka Mr. Dalvin), K-Ci and JoJo. The group had a series of highly successful singles and platinum- winning albums until 1998. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Forever My Lady (1991) * Diary of a Mad Band (1993) * The Show, the After Party, the Hotel (1995) * The Past, the Present, the Future (2015) category:1990s American music groups category:American R&B; bands
title: Jodeci
